name: Roshcard the Tower

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all Battles by 33%.

skills.name: Rebuke
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%

skills.name: Sanction
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff and a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns. These debuffs cannot be resisted.
Damage based on: [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Zone of Protection
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Block Debuff] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
